name: EggScape - BU Game Jam 2022
description:
Game Jam Theme: ESCAPE I have created a simple endless runner in UE4 using a combination of Assets from Epic Marketplace and Custom made assets. I modelled the Characters, Collectibles and (of course) all the fried eggs. Full project, report and references on my ArtStation: https://www.artstation.com/dariosplendido

File location: EggScape_GAME_BUILD\WindowsNoEditor

File Name: Escape.exe

Game Commands:

A: TURN LEFT

D: TURN RIGHT
